text:
I see this error on my Apache every day and more times a day.

The Problem is, the Apache restards to much (see Lgofile) and so many
restarts is not so good. I've read that this is a known bug when 
more than 20 Clients connect to the Apache permanently, after 10 min.
restarts Apache with this Error:


[Wed Oct 22 14:51:50 2003] file .\main\buff.c, line 232, assertion "!rv" failed
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:50 2003] [info] master_main: Child processed exited 
prematurely. Restarting the child process.
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:50 2003] [warn] Loaded DSO h:/php4/sapi/php4apache.dll uses 
plain Apache 1.3 API, this module might crash under EAPI! (please recompile it 
with -DEAPI)
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:51 2003] [info] Parent: Created child process 2896
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:51 2003] [info] Parent: Duplicating socket 292 and sending it 
to child process 2896
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:51 2003] [info] Parent: Duplicating socket 280 and sending it 
to child process 2896
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:52 2003] [warn] Loaded DSO h:/php4/sapi/php4apache.dll uses 
plain Apache 1.3 API, this module might crash under EAPI! (please recompile it 
with -DEAPI)
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:54 2003] [info] BytesRead = 372 WSAProtocolInfo = 6620
[Wed Oct 22 14:51:54 2003] [info] BytesRead = 372 WSAProtocolInfo = 6620
creator: e_konto@web.de
